person.persName: Silas H. Stone (Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Francis Tayor Stone in Crittenden County, Kentucky on May 20, 1847. Father of Mary, William, Bethel, Cassandra, Martha, James, Sarah R., Eliza J., Marion J., Ellen L., Jefferson, Joel E., George W., Emily, and Elmarinda Stone. Farmer in Butler County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Crittenden County, Kentucky in 1860.
